backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature requirements and associated frontend files for the Valentine proposal app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in styling and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH color variable setup defining Valentine-themed styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads fonts and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine proposal UI with YES success state, playful NO button movement, GIF reactions, and image fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider handling login, stored identities, and related status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus Valentine theme variables and Poppins typography setup.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extensive OKLCH-based color themes, custom radii, shadows, keyframes, and animations using several plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including Valentine proposal features, requirements, and pending feature request metadata.
